activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

title.narrative: COVID-19: Establishing WHO technical groundwork to support Act Accelerato

description.narrative: to fast track the development, production and equitable global access to safe, quality, effective and affordable COVID-19 diagnostics, therapeutics and vaccines so that lives can be spared and so that life can return to ‘normal’

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

title.narrative: COVID Impact on Private Health Markets

description.narrative: to inform strategies for engaging private healthcare providers in TB care and prevention by generating evidence on the extent to which healthcare markets in priority countries have been disrupted by the Covid pandemic

description.narrative: to accelerate the development and launch of critical Rapid Diagnostic Tests for the detection of COVID-19 infection in order to control the current global pandemic

description.narrative: to support effective response to vulnerable communities affected by COVID-19 in Bangladesh

title.narrative: COVID 19_DO ART: Demonstration of community-based HIV treatment

description.narrative: to implement and evaluate a comprehensive community-based antiretroviral therapy delivery model based on the findings of the "Delivery Optimization for Antiretroviral Therapy" trial

description.narrative: to promote equitable access to scientific information and treatments for the most vulnerable populations affected by COVID-19

description.narrative: to ensure access to dexamethasone for treatment of severe COVID-19 disease in Africa

title.narrative: COVID-19: Surveillance using environmental samples in Bangladesh

description.narrative: to develop proof-of-concept methods for SARS-CoV-2 surveillance based on sewage and fecal sludge samples

title.narrative: COVID-19 CTA: Remdesivir API Improvements via Biocatalysis

title.narrative: COVID-19: A platform solution for over-the-counter molecular dx testing

description.narrative: to develop a rapid, sensitive and easily deployable molecular diagnostic device for affordable SARS-CoV-2 detection in LMICs

description.narrative: to develop an automated high volume manufacturing process to supply diagnostics tests for pandemic, endemic diseases in normal times, and surge capacity for future pandemics to low and middle income countries
